experience.title: Senior Data Scientist
experience.description: Spearheaded development of predictive modeling framework using Python, TensorFlow, and PyTorch, improving forecast accuracy by 85%. Pioneered machine learning infrastructure reducing model training time from 48 hours to 3 hours, saving $200K annually. Led team of 6 data scientists building recommendation engine that increased user engagement by 65%. Architected end-to-end ML pipeline processing 100TB+ data daily using Apache Spark and AWS EMR. Established best practices for A/B testing and experimentation, running 50+ experiments with 95% statistical confidence. Transformed business intelligence dashboards using advanced analytics, enabling data-driven decisions that improved revenue by 40%.

experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.description: Developed customer churn prediction model using XGBoost and Random Forest, reducing churn by 30% and saving $5M annually. Built automated feature engineering pipeline processing 50+ data sources, improving model accuracy by 25%. Designed A/B testing framework for 30+ experiments, optimizing conversion rates by 20%. Collaborated with product teams to implement real-time personalization algorithms serving 10M+ users. Created executive dashboards using Tableau and SQL, enabling strategic decision-making.

experience.title: Junior Data Analyst
experience.description: Analyzed customer behavior patterns using SQL and Python, uncovering insights that increased retention by 15%. Developed automated reporting system using pandas and matplotlib, reducing manual work by 80%. Built predictive models for sales forecasting with 90% accuracy. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver 10+ analytics projects on schedule.
